name: Alien Shape (prototype)
description:
This is a protoype of a game am working on.

It consist of one level for now and i will like to receive feedbacks on the basic shooter mechanics have implemented. If  there is anything i can improve please let me know. The level is fully playable.

Level Difficulty:Medium

Controls:

Jump - Space

Movement: Arrow Keys

Shoot: S

Credits:

Level music is from MegaMan 2 metalman stage. Am not the owner of this music.
